discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @proux01 I don't understand the fix? Why does this fix the bug?

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Because `f` and `g` don't have the same type, c.f., https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/017829e1c4a6d07a3acfd73b8fcec8a6952a4b96/mathcomp/algebra/ssralg.v#L2416 and https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/017829e1c4a6d07a3acfd73b8fcec8a6952a4b96/mathcomp/algebra/ssralg.v#L2429
